mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT domain_status_cd FROM TB_DOMAIN WHERE domain_seq = #{domainSeq }) AS domain_status_cd , (SELECT lto_status_cd FROM TB_LTO WHERE lto_seq = #{ltoSeq }) AS lto_status_cd , (SELECT sto_status_cd FROM TB_STO WHERE sto_seq = #{stoSeq }) AS sto_status_cd
SELECT domain_seq , domain_name FROM TB_TMP_DOMAIN WHERE center_seq = #{centerSeq }
SELECT lto_seq , lto_name FROM TB_TMP_LTO WHERE domain_seq = (SELECT domain_tmp_seq FROM TB_DOMAIN WHERE domain_seq = #{domainSeq})
SELECT sto_seq , sto_name FROM TB_TMP_STO WHERE lto_seq = (SELECT lto_tmp_seq FROM TB_LTO WHERE lto_seq = #{ltoSeq})
